ComicInfo.Title: Jungles of Jamaa; Mine! All Mine!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The all-ages action continues in Animal Jam #2, the second issue of Dynamite Entertainment’s WILDEST new sensation– based on the MASSIVELY popular video game by National Geographic and WildWorks (with over 70 million players worldwide)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Fernando Ruiz & Peter Pantazis | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Fleecs | 2 | C | Coloring Book Cover C | Fernando Ruiz | 3 |
